attributes.additional_details: We feel that it is imperative that people feel safe and are able to identify clearly those who have had the vaccination. Such passports would not be used to restrict the rights of people who have refused a Covid-19 vaccine and would be acceptable.
attributes.background: We want the Government to commit to rolling out e-vaccination status/immunity passports to the British public. Such passports would allow those who have had the vaccination to travel either domestically and/or abroad.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575297
